scoundrel.name: Crippling Shot
scoundrel.description:
Ranged attack that slows the target by 60% for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 6 seconds

scoundrel.name: Poison Bolts
scoundrel.description:
Ranged attack which deals 40% weapon damage and an additional 40% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 6 seconds

scoundrel.name: Dirty Fighting
scoundrel.description:
Blinds enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 30 seconds

scoundrel.name: Vanish
scoundrel.description:
The Scoundrel vanishes in a cloud of smoke when injured, reappearing after 5 seconds. While vanished, he will heal himself for 15505 Life.

Cooldown: 30 seconds
scoundrel.simpleDescription: The Scoundrel temporarily vanishes when in danger.

scoundrel.name: Multishot
scoundrel.description: The Scoundrel's ranged attacks fire 3 bolts at a time.

scoundrel.name: Powered Shot
scoundrel.description:
Powerful ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 25% weapon damage as Arcane to targets within 6 yards and has a 50% chance to Stun targets for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: 20 seconds
scoundrel.simpleDescription: Deals massive damage in an area and knocks back enemies.

scoundrel.name: Anatomy
scoundrel.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 3% for the Scoundrel and his allies.
scoundrel.simpleDescription: Increases the Critical Hit Chance of the Scoundrel and his allies.

scoundrel.name: Hysteria
scoundrel.description: Whenever you or the Scoundrel land a Critical Hit, you both will go into hysterics, increasing all damage done by 10% for 3 seconds. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
scoundrel.simpleDescription: Critical Hits cause you and the Scoundrel to temporarily deal more damage.

templar.name: Heal
templar.description:
Heals you or the Templar for 4651 Life.

Cooldown: 30 seconds

templar.name: Intervene
templar.description:
Taunts enemies attacking the hero for 3 seconds when the hero is below 50% Life.

Cooldown: 60 seconds
templar.simpleDescription: Taunts enemies when the hero's Life is low.

templar.name: Intimidate
templar.description: Enemy units are slowed by 60% for 3 seconds when they hit the Templar.

templar.name: Loyalty
templar.description: Regenerates 155 Life per second for you and the Templar.
templar.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

templar.name: Charge
templar.description:
Charges a target, dealing 50% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: 30 seconds
templar.simpleDescription: Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning the target.

templar.name: Onslaught
templar.description:
Delivers a massive blow to an enemy for 200% weapon damage.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
templar.simpleDescription: Delivers a massive blow to an enemy.

templar.name: Guardian
templar.description:
Rush to the aid of wounded ally, knocking back enemies within 15 yards and healing the wounded ally for 4651 Life.

Cooldown: 30 seconds
templar.simpleDescription: When hero Life is low, the Templar will come to your aid, knocking back nearby enemies and healing you.

templar.name: Inspire
templar.description:
Increase resource generation for all allies that the Templar is following.
Mana: 2 per second.
Arcane Power: 0.5 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Fury: 8% generated.
Spirit: 12% generated.

enchantress.name: Charm
enchantress.description:
Charms an enemy to fight for you for 4 seconds.

Cooldown: 25 seconds
enchantress.simpleDescription: Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

enchantress.name: Forceful Push
enchantress.description:
Summon an Arcane explosion 8 yards around an enemy, dealing 100% weapon damage as Arcane and knocking back all monsters caught within it.

Cooldown: 10 seconds
enchantress.simpleDescription: Creates an explosion that deals massive damage and knocks back enemies.

enchantress.name: Powered Armor
enchantress.description: Enchantress buffs herself and her allies, increasing Armor by 15%. Attackers are slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.
enchantress.simpleDescription: Increases the armor of the Enchantress and her allies, and slows attacking enemies.

enchantress.name: Reflect Missiles
enchantress.description:
Place a shield on the Enchantress and her allies that reflects incoming projectiles for 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 20 seconds
enchantress.simpleDescription: Creates a shield around the Enchantress and her allies that reflects projectiles.

enchantress.name: Disorient
enchantress.description:
Cast a flash of Confusion on a group of enemies in an area, causing them to stumble around disoriented for 2 seconds.

Cooldown: 45 seconds

enchantress.name: Erosion
enchantress.description:
Conjures a pool of energy that deals 50% weapon damage as Arcane per second. Affected enemies take an extra 15% damage from all attacks for 3 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
enchantress.simpleDescription: Blasts a target area, causing enemies to take damage over time.

enchantress.name: Focused Mind
enchantress.description: An aura that increases attack speed by 3% for allies within 40 yards.
enchantress.simpleDescription: Increases the attack speed of the Enchantress and her allies.

enchantress.name: Mass Control
enchantress.description:
The Enchantress lobs a bulb of magical energy at the player that will hex all enemies within 15 yards into chickens for 5 seconds. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions.

Cooldown: 60 seconds
